name: Number-Jumper
description:
A deep space themed game where the only way to survive is to move around and collect boosters that improve your sanity. Use your keyboard to navigate and jump on tiles, which randomly fall down and limit your movements. Try to get as much score as you can until you finally lose your sanity. Be brave, be quick, be ready to lose!

Control

Move: WASD/←↑→↓

Jump: SPACE

Camera: MOUSE
